mapper.select: select count(study_name), study_type.study_type_name from study_room inner join study_type on study_room.study_type_num = study_type.study_type_num and study_type.study_type_num=#{param1}

select study_room.study_name,count(study_like.study_num) as cnt from study_like inner join study_room on study_like.study_num = study_room.study_num group by study_like.study_num order by cnt desc limit 7
select date_format(user.register_date, '%Y.%m') register_date , count(user_id) cnt from user group by date_format(user.register_date, '%Y.%m') order by register_date asc
